mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysStplatUse Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ STPLAT_CD , STPLAT_USE_TP_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_STPLAT_USE WHERE 1 = 1 AND STPLAT_CD = #{stplatCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STPLAT_USE_TP_CD = #{stplatUseTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
